item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, November 11, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump rules out jobs for Mike Pompeo and Nikki Haley in administration
2. [Opinion] Democrats do not know how to talk to young men — and it cost them
3. Bitcoin hits record high as Republicans edge closer to full control of Congress
4. Amsterdam on edge after violence against Israeli football fans
5. The Maga court: inside Donald Trump’s new White House
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, November 11, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
